English: You were at the railway station.

French: Je ne connais pas mes voisins.
Je ne trouve pas mes bagages.

English: It isn't my fault that you got into an {{c::argument}}.
French: Je ne vous fais pas vous bagarrer.
Je ne peux pas, pour le {{c::moment}}.

English: I just want to talk to you.

French: Je ne l'ai pas vu dernièrement.

English: He is in {{c::front}} of the door.
Tom didn't do that very much.
